interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Good Fortune
Review Date: 2017/12/13
Store: John Paul DeJoria  (Actor),     Dan Aykroyd  (Actor),     Josh Tickell  (Director),     Rebecca Harrell Tickell  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Documentary
Product Description: ["'Success unshared is failure.'GOOD FORTUNE is the rags to riches tale of conscious capitalism pioneer John Paul DeJoria. The son of Greek immigrants, born into humble beginnings in East Los Angeles, John Paul DeJoria has built a life full of good fortune and achieved vast wealth through a variety of businesses, among them John Paul Mitchell Hair Care Systems and Patron Tequila.In 1980, he partnered with Paul Mitchell to start a line of professional hair care products. They turned a $700 investment and 3 products into a wildly successful venture that today is worth more than $800 million. Proving his success wasn't just a fluke, John Paul then created the largest and the most recognizable tequila brand in the world - Patron.GOOD FORTUNE focuses on DeJoria's inspiring success story as well as his philanthropy. It's the true tale of a man who overcame obstacles and dedicates his life to giving back to those less fortunate. He ran through his early adulthood in and out of motorcycle gangs and today John Paul's quest is finding innovative ways to share his sizable fortune. DeJoria spends his life creating back-to-work programs for the homeless, fighting whale poachers in the Arctic and working on over 100 other philanthropic ventures. Along with Bill Gates and Warren Buffet DeJoria signed 'The Giving Pledge,' a formal promise to continue to contribute more than half of their wealth to philanthropy or charitable causes during their lifetime or in their will.Dan Aykroyd narrates the film spinning colorful stories with humor and wit. GOOD FORTUNE is an incredibly powerful and noble narrative that gives an informative and entertaining picture of this self-made billionaire and verifiable poster boy of the American dream."]
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Special Interests', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': 'John Paul DeJoria, Josh Tickell, Dan Aykroyd, Arianna Huffington, Danny Trejo, Cheech Marin, Rebecca Harrell TickellJohn Paul DeJoria, Josh Tickell, Dan Aykroyd, Arianna Huffington, Danny Trejo, Cheech Marin, Rebecca Harrell Tickell  See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 26 minutes', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Director': 'Josh Tickell, Rebecca Harrell Tickell', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 26 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 14, 2017', 'Actors': 'John Paul DeJoria, Dan Aykroyd, Danny Trejo, Cheech Marin, Arianna Huffington', 'Studio': 'Audio Fidelity', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I heard about this dvd on The Garry Meier podcast out of Chicago. The price was fair on amazon so I immediately jumped on buying a copy. I did not know much about John Paul DeJoria except he was with Paul Mitchell Hair. This dvd is well edited and very entertaining. It's about an hour, maybe a little over. John Paul's life of "rags to riches" and ending up a philanthropic billionaire with a heart of gold was so heart warming to see. I shared this with several people who enjoyed it as well.
Review Title: Heart warming !
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Glad I got to stream it. season 4 The Real Housewives of Orange County: Season 1 Jeana Tomasino (Actor) Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles ['Desperate for more housewife drama? Then get ready for addictive, indulgent fun with Season One of Bravo\'s hit sensation, The Real Housewives of Orange County! Join five real-life ladies of leisure—Jo, Jeana, Lauri, Vicki and Kimberly—for an all-access pass inside their exclusive planned community. Whether they\'re sharing cocktails, shopping trips, travel plans or Botox treatments, these stylish women espose the realities of living in Southern California luxury! Available on DVD for the first time, this must-own 2-disc set includes every revealing episode from the first season, plus the can\'t-miss reunion special. For the best guilty pleasure entertainment around, take home this sensation that the New York Daily News calls "utterly" addictive.'] {'Genre': 'Television, DVD Movie, Television/Reality Shows, Blu-ray Movie', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Jeana Tomasino', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MOV-REALHWORANG', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '5 hours and 3 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 4, 2007', 'Actors': 'Jeana Tomasino', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'} I wish this show was available on Prime Instant but it's not so I bought the dvd (cheaper than 1.99 pay per view).
RHOC is the only version I watch. It was great to see the beginning again. profile:
**User Summary Update:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user continues to exhibit a diverse taste in movies, with a notable emphasis on comedy and fantasy. Recent interactions suggest a burgeoning interest in documentaries, particularly those highlighting inspirational true stories and personal journeys, complementing their nostalgia for character-driven narratives.

- **Actor Affinity:** The user's preference for notable figures now extends further into documentaries and reality television, embracing personalities that convey engaging stories beyond traditional film roles.

- **Decision-Making:** Impulsive purchasing behavior remains prevalent, especially when enticing narratives or familiar personalities are involved. The user demonstrates a tendency to seek out engaging content featuring well-known individuals across various formats.

- **Satisfaction Level:** Their low tolerance for predictable narratives persists, yet they appreciate content that offers heartwarming and relatable stories, akin to their affinity for nostalgic series. This balance enhances their viewing experience.

- **Review Attitude:** The user is direct in their feedback, valuing well-crafted storytelling. Their latest review highlights an appreciation for narratives that evoke heartfelt responses and resonate with personal journeys.

- **Overall Rating:** The user distinguishes between star power and the quality of storytelling, increasingly recognizing engaging performances and meaningful narratives as pivotal to their satisfaction, reinforcing their eclectic entertainment preferences.

In summary, the user continues to embrace nostalgia while expanding their palate to include documentaries that align with their appreciation for compelling personal stories and star appeal.
